section.title: Axiom 3 - Ruler
section.statement: Given a system of measurement, every segment can be assigned a unique positive number called it's length. Given \overline{PQ}, it's length will be denoted by PQ. Conversely, given a point P on a line l, for every positive number x there are two unique points Q and R on line l such that Q-P-R and QP = PR=x.
